item.title: Cops Dashboard Videos Show Racial Slur, Fleeing Suspects Hit By Cruisers
item.description: ##16:23 Friday 21 March 2008 Videos Show S.C. Troopers Behaving Badly, Feds Launch Probe After Dashboard Videos Show Racial Slur, Fleeing Suspects Hit By Cruisers - CBS News A federal investigation was launched into the South Carolina Highway Patrol after dashboard camera videos showed a trooper using a racial slur and two others ramming their cruisers into fleeing suspects, a prosecutor said Thursday. Oh my god. What is happening to the world?
